string: The operation being performed by a program in Zed requires elevated permission.
An application in Zed wants to use AppleScript.
An application in Zed wants to use Bluetooth.
An application in Zed wants to use Calendar data.
An application in Zed wants to use the camera.
An application in Zed wants to use your contacts.
An application in Zed wants to use your location information, even in the background.
An application in Zed wants to use your location information.
An application in Zed wants to use your location information while active.
An application in Zed wants to use your microphone.
An application in Zed wants to use speech recognition.
An application in Zed wants to use your reminders.
